entry.title: TorchCrepe pitch tracker: 2,000,0000+ downloads.

entry.title: Try the VampNet demo: Music Generation via Masked Acoustic Token Modeling.

link.title: Try the VampNet demo: Music Generation via Masked Acoustic Token Modeling.

entry.content:
Our paper “VAMPNET: Music Generation via Masked Acoustic Token Modeling” was accepted to ISMIR 2023.

Click HERE to try out VampNet!
entry.summary: Our paper “VAMPNET: Music Generation via Masked Acoustic Token Modeling” was accepted to ISMIR 2023.

entry.title: Our tech inside Adobe’s new AI-powered audio editor

link.title: Our tech inside Adobe’s new AI-powered audio editor

entry.content:
Adobe just announced their Podcast web-based AI-powered audio editing and recording tools. The Mic Check tool in Podcast applies work from our patent “Sound quality prediction and interface to facilitate high-quality voice recordings” to ensure users make better recordings.

See the Voice Assist video or the our 2019 CHI paper “VoiceAssist: Guiding Users to High-Quality Voice Recordings” for the technical details.
entry.summary: Adobe just announced their Podcast web-based AI-powered audio editing and recording tools. The Mic Check tool in Podcast applies work from our patent “Sound quality prediction and interface to facilitate high-quality voice recordings” to ensure users make better recordings.
